tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policyholders (
    policyholder_id INT NOT NULL,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    contact_details VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (policyholder_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Policies (
    policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_id INT REFERENCES Policyholders(id),
    policy_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Beneficiaries (
    beneficiary_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT REFERENCES Policies(policy_id),
    name VARCHAR(255),
    relationship VARCHAR(50),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policyholder_id INT REFERENCES policyholders(policyholder_id),
  policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
);
